primaryItems.name: NP2
primaryItems.caption: North Cliffside Path from Pavilion, 1875. Completed in this configuration with construction of Distribution Arch in 1860.
primaryItems.credit: Photo by James A. Cremer, Courtesy of Fairmount Park Archives

secondaryItems.name: NC1
secondaryItems.caption: Fairmount looking south from North Garden, c.1875
secondaryItems.credit: Photo Courtesy of Robert N. Dennis Collection, New York Public Library

secondaryItems.name: NC2
secondaryItems.caption: Distribution Arch looking north from crest of Fairmount Reservoir, 1865. Served as a link between the then-under-construction New Mill House and the Standpipe.

secondaryItems.name: NC4
secondaryItems.caption: New Mill House from North Cliffside Path through Distribution Arch, 1865
secondaryItems.credit: Photo by R. Newell and Courtesy of Robert N. Dennis Collection, New York Public Library
